title: Early Mathematical Image Formation: An Exploratory Study Through Longitudinal Teaching Experiments

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: A process analyzing mathematical image formation mechanisms in secondary education and researching learners' individual cognitive processes using clinical interview techniques

learning_goals: Learners can observe the initial mathematical image formation process by applying clinical interview methods
Learners can identify developmental stages of mathematical imagery through longitudinal data analysis
Learners can visualize learners' mental imagery expression patterns using digital tools
Learners can design individualized mathematics teaching strategies based on analytical results
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
